title: Are thinking patterns in humans categorized? - Quora

response.answer_text: Probably yes, but that book is BS - because ALL thinking patterns are individually generated - WE are either prisoners of our own mind or we break free. I prefer the latter - why? Conditioning and Programming are means of the ones who rule - why is it: GOVERNMENTAL Decisions to govern the MENTAL STATE to DO that they have decided upon? HMMM Nice, right? Here you go, some more to ponder:
